release.action: Changed the preferences pages to separate adapter related preferences from proxy related ones.
Removed the properties folder which is not used anymore (since issue 59 is fixed). There is a new distribution folder to receive generated jar and war archives.
Fixed issue 46: J2EE war folder preference is ignored in Eclipse plugin adapter generator.
Fixed issue 50: Remove systematic final attributes on methods.
Fixed issue 51: Remove static attribute on commons logging logger.
Started a fundamental move toward storing context in the PreferenceStore using the new IPreferenceStore mechanism. This allow context to be stored at the project level and fixes Issue 11.
The plugins now support the POJO target for Proxies as alternatives to Web Service targets.
Created a set of reusable classes at the cixscom level in order to share them with JBoss ESB and Mule.
Fixing legstar-jbossesb issue 3: was unable to attach source or javadoc to LegStar library containers jars.
Fixed Issue 24: Finish button was enabled on first page of multipage wizards as soon as the page was valid. This is often too early as mandatory parameters are collected on subsequent pages.
Fixed Issue 22 : Operation mapping plugin: Clicking on add structure and returning without adding one result in this invalid record: input coxbType="nullBinding" coxbPackageName="null.bind".

The Structures Mapping Generator takes an additional parameter to collect the JAXB Classes name prefix. Field values entered on the generator are stored in the preferences store so that they are presented as default values next time the plugin is used.

Issue 23. Added a Maven-based update mechanism for all Eclipse Plugin version-dependent PDE resources. MANIFEST.MF files and build.properties files are generated to reflect the Maven versions. Features and Sites are now Maven controlled (Although Maven still does not create the Eclipse distributables).

Fixed the binding generator plugin: When a root element has a named complex type it was shown twice creating confusion. Furthermore, selecting the element instead of the type was leading the binding generator to fail looking for the wrong create method in the jaxb object factory.
Fixed issue with New Operations Mapping plugin which was raising an NPE when no project is selected in the Package Explorer.
